field.label: URI
field.helpText: The URI to the controller in the form tcp://host:port

field.label: Stream Name
field.helpText: The name of the stream to read from.

field.label: Scope
field.helpText: The scope name of the stream to read from.

field.label: Read Timeout (ms)
field.helpText: The maximum amount of time the consumer will wait for a message

field.label: Routing Key
field.helpText: The routing key of the message to write.
